articles.author: India Today News Desk
articles.title: Bharat Mata was criticised on foreign land again: BJP targets Rahul Gandhi - India Today
articles.description: Union Minister and BJP leader Jyotiraditya Scindia, in a reference to comments made by Rahul Gandhi during his Europe visit, said that India was criticised on foreign land once again.
articles.content: Union Minister and BJP leader Jyotiraditya Scindia on Monday accused Congress leader Rahul Gandhi of criticising India, or "Bharat Mata," abroad due to a "narrow mentality" and jealousy over India's … [+1480 chars]
